resources.string: Setting an appointment to your doctors in just simple clicks.
Please provide your NHI number so we can pull up your record
Please complete your profile for our record
If you know your NHI number please provide below. If not, please inform your doctor or GP.
There are 2 ways to send your comments or queries. You can send us a message via email or sms.
Drop us a line so we can attend to your queries.
A way to automate your registration process

Generic Registration System is an application which can be widely used on different industry, such as hospitals, schools, libraries, hotels and offices. This can be customized based on the specific industry that will use this application.

Alan and Rhiza are students from Cornell Institute of Business and Technology taking up Software Development under the supervision of Shuaib Memon. This mobile application is created as one of their requirements, but at the same time this will be used in the industry.
We make sure that all of your personal details are well secured.
Connect over the net to book an appointment and get the latest update for your doctor\'s schedule.
No need to call to set an appointment or check the availability of the doctors.
Less is more. Simple interface that all ages can easily follow and understand.
